title: Dark Angel
description: Rachael is the Dark Angel. Murdered six centuries ago, she was denied Heaven. Too good to be damned in Hell but not pure enough to enter Heaven. Now she walks the streets of London, drawing strength from the lusts and passions of strangers. Angels seek her salvation but a demon hunts her. Her old soul is rich in power, the demon wishes to burn that soul to gain her strength
author: C.J.  Heath
